Regulation Name(s): Streptococcus spp. nucleic acid based assay
Analyte(s): Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus, Strep A)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Liat Strep A Assay, a rapid automated real-time PCR test for qualitative detection of Streptococcus pyogenes in throat swab specimens using the Liat Analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test performed on the Liat Analyzer for detection of Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus) in throat swab specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of pharyngitis.
